channel.title: Troykyo Fab Academy 2015
channel.description: This site contains the coursework for Troy Nachtigall during the 2015 edition of Fab Accademy.

item.title: Welcome to Fab Academy
item.description: In our first and second prep classes for Fab Academy 2015 the Fablab Cascina team spent two evenings this week learning to use GIT/HG ad hosting a static website on GitHub. If you are reading this our mission was accomplished.
